name: Bristle
summary: You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines.
description:
You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines. You gain a +1 circumstance to AC until the start of your next turn.

Special If you have the Barbed Quills reaction or a quills unarmed attack, each gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn.Traits

Shisk: Secretive humanoids covered in bony plumage that reside underground.
